definition: bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
to fill or stuff/(of a form etc) to fill in

sentences.english: The first mistake marketers make is that they want more.
sentences.chinese: 營銷人員所犯的第一個錯誤就是他們的慾壑難填。

sentences.english: They have voracious appetites for facts and figures of any kind.
sentences.chinese: 他們對任何類型的數據和事實的胃口都是慾壑難填。
